TAOS.Name: Adventures of Superseven - Episode 1 -  Superseven Operation Trapezoid Conundrum
TAOS.Plot: Can Sandra West thwart a plot to assassinate Superseven on live TV?

TAOS.Name: Adventures Of Superseven - Epsiode 2 - Operation Breakdown
TAOS.Plot: Superseven is hot on the trail of the ruthless double Agent 'Mamba'...Can Superseven catch him before Sandra West does!

TAOS.Name: Adventures Of Superseven - Epsiode 3 - Operation Fourplay Part 1
TAOS.Plot: A deserted theatre....A midnight rendezvous...A cunning trap...Will Superseven survive!!!

TAOS.Name: Adventures Of Superseven - Epsiode 4 - Operation Fourplay Part 2
TAOS.Plot: On the way home from their rendezvous with sword play, Superseven and Sandra West encounter a duo of deadly assassins...With a contract!

TAOS.Name: Adventures Of Superseven - Epsiode 5 - Up Close & Personal - Interview
TAOS.Plot: An up close and personal interview with masked super spy, Superseven!

TAOS.Name: Adventures Of Superseven - Epsiode 6 - Up Close & Personal - Sandra West Interview
TAOS.ShortName: Up Close & Personal - Sandra West Interview
TAOS.Plot: An interview with sultry, sexy, super-spy...Sandra West!

TAOS.Name: Adventures Of Superseven - Epsiode 7 - Operation Red Shark
TAOS.Plot: Stressed from a mission and his interactions with Sandra West, Superseven seeks solace in the East. On his return, Superseven has words with his mechanic 'Sparky' about his crime fighting vehicle

TAOS.Name: Adventures Of Superseven - Epsiode 8 - Operation Prime Time
TAOS.Plot: Superseven and Sandra West encounter a former T.H.E.Y agent, turned Hollywood producer.

TAOS.Name: Adventures Of Superseven - Epsiode 9 - Operation Get Sandra West
TAOS.Plot: Superseven returns from Asia when he senses that Sandra West is in mortal danger!

TAOS.Name: Adventures Of Superseven - Epsiode 10 - A Coffin For Sandra West
TAOS.Plot: Sandra West falls into a T.H.E.Y trap, while Superseven goes on a mission to destroy a secret enemy rocket base.

TAOS.Name: Adventures Of Superseven - Epsiode 11 - Operation: Death Trap Burbank
TAOS.Plot: Superseven meets with a double agent to find out the fate of Sandra West.

TAOS.Name: Adventures Of Superseven - Epsiode 12 - Operation: Diabolical
TAOS.Plot: Sandra West is held captive and interrogated by Big O, Dr. Diabolical and Thunderpussy.

The Guild.Name: The Guild - Season 1 - Episode 1 - Wake-Up Call
The Guild.Plot: Cyd Sherman's online gaming addiction brings more than she bargains for...

The Guild.Name: The Guild - Season 1 - Episode 2 - Zaboo'd
The Guild.Plot: Cyd Sherman's imaginary world becomes all too real when a gnome warlock shows up on her doorstep.

The Guild.Name: The Guild - Season 1 - Episode 3 - The Macro Problem
The Guild - Season 1 - Episode 4 - Cheesybeards
The Guild.Plot: The Knights of Good finally meet face to face and...it's awkward.

The Guild.Name: The Guild - Season 1 - Episode 5 - Rather Be Raiding
The Guild.Plot: Codex struggles to keep the Guild meeting on track, and everything turns out great! Not.

The Guild.Name: The Guild - Season 1 - Episode 6 - Total Wipe
The Guild.Plot: Emotions run high in the Guild after the disastrous Cheeseybeards meeting.

The Guild.Name: The Guild - Season 1 - Episode 7 - Home Invasion
The Guild.Plot: Codex discovers why Zaboo is so weird. It's genetic.

The Guild.Name: The Guild - Season 1 - Episode 8 - Tipping Point
The Guild.Plot: It's up to Codex to grow a spine, eep.

The Guild.Name: The Guild - Season 1 - Episode 9 - Owning Bladezz
The Guild.Plot: The Guild confronts Bladezz and Codex holds the trump card.

The Guild.Name: The Guild - Season 1 - Episode 10 - Boss Fight
The Guild.Plot: The Guild faces the biggest boss of all time...Zaboo's Mom

Justice Woman.Name: Justice Woman - Season 1 Episode 1 - Luck be a Lady
Justice Woman.Plot: Meet Sofia Escala, an Assistant D.A. committed to justice, who wants to take on more than traffic and DWI cases. Her admiration for the all-star prosecutor Brent Renard leads her to peruse his latest triumph, State v. Lopez, in the hopes of getting on his radar, but what she discovers puts Brent's ability to have won that case into question.

Justice Woman.Name: Justice Woman - Season 1 Episode 2 - A Bit Much
Justice Woman.Plot: Sofia convinces Rob to investigate a discrepancy she found in the State v. Lopez files, leading them to an abandoned warehouse where they unexpectedly stumble upon a meeting of corrupt forces. Their presence does not go unperceived by the bad guys. Will they escape?

Justice Woman.Name: Justice Woman - Season 1 Episode 3 - Crossing the Line
Justice Woman.Plot: Sometimes the obvious needs to come out to make the stench of injustice come to light. What is justice? It's certainly not blind. And if you're rich and powerful or a combination of the two you've got nothing to fear. The rich, the powerful, they make their own justice. But what they don't know is that she is on the inside too like a virus. She'll play the game and they'll never know she's there killing the unjust from the inside.

Justice Woman.Name: Justice Woman - Season 2 Episode 1 - Right with Might
Justice Woman.Plot: The saga continues as Sof√≠a Escala, a.k.a. Justice Woman, and Robert Gallion, a.k.a. Roberta, delve deeper into the wrongdoings of a corrupt legal system to make right with might no longer one traffic ticket at a time, but one person at a time.

Justice Woman.Name: Justice Woman - Season 2 Episode 2 - Nowhere to Turn
Justice Woman.Plot: Sofia and Robert discuss Steven Romero's domestic violence situation among other things as she questions why anyone would put up with such hatred at home. As the conversation turns lighter, Kevin enters their office and joins in the conversation to boast about the Judge assigning him to the Lopez matter, which makes Sofia perk up. As she stays behind working and alone in the office, Sofia realizes that, as a gay man, Steven has nowhere to turn for support. Suddenly, an unexpected visitor shows up and Sofia now feels trapped with nowhere to turn. Will she escape?

Justice Woman.Name: Justice Woman - Season 2 Episode 3 - Meat On A Stick
Justice Woman.Plot: Managing to get out of her office, Sofia calls and interrupts Robert's romantic evening to ask him to come get her at work quickly; she's in danger. Robert shows up and the two find themselves once again in a tight situation as they eavesdrop on a discussion between the the strange visitor and the Judge who plan to pay a witness to testify that Jesus Lopez is not innocent, which will lead to the exoneration of Brent Renard. Will Sofia and Robert get caught eavesdropping this time?

Justice Woman.Name: Justice Woman - Season 2 Episode 4 - Chasing Cars
Justice Woman.Plot: Sofia and Robert think they've managed to get away free and clear until Rufus, the villain, catches up to them. A car chase ensues. However, there's a certain Mysterious Woman chasing their tails as well. Who can she be? And more importantly, how will Sofia and Robert escape or will they?

Justice Woman.Name: Justice Woman - Season 2 Episode 5 - Untouchable
Justice Woman.Plot: Having played Sofia's knight in shining armor, Rob now faces the possibility of losing his boyfriend Phil while giving Ruby, the Judge's secretary, the wrong impression of his orientation. As Rob tries to evade Ruby discretely, Sofia outright rejects Joe in fear of her mother's behavior. But how bad can mama be?

Anyone But Me.Name: Anyone But Me - Episode 1 -  Heavy Lifting
Anyone But Me.Plot: Vivian McMillan moves out of the city and away from herself.

Anyone But Me.Name: Anyone But Me - Episode 2 -  New Alliance
Anyone But Me - Episode 3 -  Countdown
Anyone But Me.Plot: A lot can happen in one day.

Anyone But Me.Name: Anyone But Me - Episode 4 -  Vivian + Aster
Anyone But Me.Plot: Vivian and Aster reunite and sparks fly. Maybe it's true you can't go home again.

Anyone But Me.Name: Anyone But Me - Episode 5 -  The Note Pt. 1
Anyone But Me.Plot: Vivian and Aster are feeling the distance. Sophie and Jonathan don't see eye to eye.

Anyone But Me.Name: Anyone But Me - Episode 6 -  The Note Pt. 2
Anyone But Me.Plot: Aster unfolds the past to figure out the present. Archibald and Elisabeth have a run in. Sophie puts Vivian on the spot.

Anyone But Me.Name: Anyone But Me - Episode 7 -  Welcome to the Party. Now Clean Up the Mess Pt. 1
Anyone But Me.ShortName: Welcome to the Party. Now Clean Up the Mess Pt. 1

Anyone But Me.Name: Anyone But Me - Episode 8 -  Welcome to the Party. Now Clean Up the Mess Pt. 2
Anyone But Me.ShortName: Welcome to the Party. Now Clean Up the Mess Pt. 2
Anyone But Me.Plot: Relationships are put on the line.

Anyone But Me.Name: Anyone But Me - Episode 9 -  Out of the Gate
Anyone But Me.Plot: In the year of getting to know us, some things you never heard. And a hint or two about where we go from here. An intimate free for all.

Anyone But Me.Name: Anyone But Me - Episode 10 -  Enormous Changes at the Last Minute
Anyone But Me.ShortName: Enormous Changes at the Last Minute
Anyone But Me.Plot: A class trip to The New York Times turns up a story of its own.

Chop Socky Boom.Name: Chop Socky Boom - Episode 1 - Auditions
Chop Socky Boom.Plot: Seattle based web series 'Final Zodiac Warrior' hosts auditions for twelve open roles: Rat, Ox, Tiger, Rabbit, Dragon, Snake, Horse, Goat, Monkey, Rooster, Dog and Pig.

Chop Socky Boom.Name: Chop Socky Boom - Episode 2 - Callbacks
Chop Socky Boom.Plot: Three rounds of callbacks for 'Final Zodiac Warrior' pit Seattle indie actors against one another as they compete in martial arts, group combat and 'improv.'

Chop Socky Boom.Name: Chop Socky Boom - Episode 3 - Day One on Set
Chop Socky Boom.Plot: Director Trick of 'Final Zodiac Warrior' puts the cast through their paces on the first day on set.

Chop Socky Boom.Name: Chop Socky Boom - Episode 4 - The Nude Scene
Chop Socky Boom.Plot: Tensions run high amongst the cast and crew of 'Final Zodiac Warrior' in anticipation of the scheduled nude scene.

Chop Socky Boom.Name: Chop Socky Boom - Episode 5 - The Day Job
Chop Socky Boom.Plot: Seattle based web series 'Final Zodiac Warrior' shuts down to recast when the Director fires the Dragon Warrior.

Chop Socky Boom.Name: Chop Socky Boom - Episode 6 - The Table Read
Chop Socky Boom.Plot: Seattle based web series 'Final Zodiac Warrior' holds the first table read with Action Star, 'D'Angelo.'

Chop Socky Boom.Name: Chop Socky Boom - Episode 7 - The DIVAS Episode
Chop Socky Boom.Plot: Final Zodiac Warrior cast and crew members wrestle with their own inner divas in preparation for D'Angelo's first scene.

Chop Socky Boom.Name: Chop Socky Boom - Episode 8 - The Thunderdome Episode
Chop Socky Boom.Plot: When the new FZW Line Producer announces that the show is broke, Trick develops a plan to keep the cameras rolling. Will fortune continue to favor the misfits?

Rwby.Name: Rwby - Episode 1 - Ruby Rose
Rwby.Plot: The debut episode of the new series RWBY, created by Monty Oum.

Rwby.Name: Rwby - Episode 2 - The Shining Beacon
Rwby.Plot: The story focuses on a group of four girls in their first year at a legendary academy where they will learn to fight monsters.

Rwby.Name: Rwby - Episode 3 - The Shining Beacon, Part 2
Rwby.Plot: The story focuses on a group of four girls in their first year at a legendary academy where they will learn to fight monsters.

Rwby.Plot: The story focuses on a group of four girls in their first year at a legendary academy where they will learn to fight monsters.

Rwby.Plot: The story focuses on a group of four girls in their first year at a legendary academy where they will learn to fight monsters.

Rwby.Plot: The story focuses on a group of four girls in their first year at a legendary academy where they will learn to fight monsters.

Rwby.Name: Rwby - Episode 14 - Forever Fall Part 2
Rwby.Plot: The story focuses on a group of four girls in their first year at a legendary academy where they will learn to fight monsters.

Rwby.Plot: The story focuses on a group of four girls in their first year at a legendary academy where they will learn to fight monsters.

Rwby.Name: Rwby - Episode 16 - Black and White
Rwby.Plot: The story focuses on a group of four girls in their first year at a legendary academy where they will learn to fight monsters.

Walking In Circles.Name: Walking In Circles - Episode 1 - Party Up
Walking In Circles.Plot: Krag and the party battle a group of bandits deep in the forest. Well, Krag does.

Walking In Circles.Name: Walking In Circles - Episode 2 - Walking
Walking In Circles.Plot: Lost in the forest, will the party find their way out before Markus kills Garand? Do you really want them to?

Walking In Circles.Name: Walking In Circles - Episode 3 - Old Debt
Walking In Circles.Plot: Markus‚Äôs overdue bills put a serious damper on the party‚Äôs day.

Walking In Circles.Name: Walking In Circles - Episode 4 - Dysfunctional Democracy
Walking In Circles.Plot: When Markus challenges Krag‚Äôs leadership things get heated. A fundamental misunderstanding of the democratic process almost leads to murder.

Walking In Circles.Name: Walking In Circles - Episode 5 - The Master of Darkness
Walking In Circles.Plot: Can Krag and the party defeat a vampire? Probably not, but luckily it‚Äôs just a kid in a costume.

Walking In Circles.Name: Walking In Circles - Episode 6 - Horace
Walking In Circles.Plot: Krag‚Äôs dad is mad and we‚Äôre glad. Enter the netherworld and learn far more than you ever wanted to about Krag‚Äôs parents.

Walking In Circles.Name: Walking In Circles - Episode 7 - Countersong
Walking In Circles.Plot: When flesh eating abominations from the depths of the lake threaten the party, only Garand has the power to stop them.

Walking In Circles.Name: Walking In Circles - Episode 8 - The Old Man and The Lake
Walking In Circles.ShortName: The Old Man and The Lake
Walking In Circles.Plot: Garand's music saved the day, which comes as a surprise to absolutely everyone. Krag and Markus are still down for the count, and a mysterious old man may be the key to saving them. Either that or he's planning to kill them.

Walking In Circles.Name: Walking In Circles - Episode 9 - Coming Out
Walking In Circles.Plot: Garand may seem cheerful and innocent, but what skeletons lurk in his closet? A secret revealed, a trust betrayed, a bard mocked.

Walking In Circles.Name: Walking In Circles - Episode 10 - Random Encounter
Walking In Circles.Plot: As the party ascends the mountain they come across a mad cult. Shall diplomacy win the day, or will it be hack and slash for the win?

Walking In Circles.Name: Walking In Circles - Episode 11 - Let Sleeping Dragons Lie
Walking In Circles.Plot: Krag comes face to face with the dragon, Slithalazalamazar. But when new information comes to light, Krag finds that his true enemy may have been at home all along.

Video Game High School.Title: Video Game High School
Video Game High School.Creator: Matthew Arnold, Will Campos and Brian Firenzi

Video Game High School.Name: Video Game High School (VGHS) - Episode 1
Video Game High School.Plot: The first episode for our feature-length webseries 'Video Game High School!'

Video Game High School.Name: Video Game High School (VGHS) - Episode 2
Video Game High School.Plot: Episode two of our feature-length webseries 'Video Game High School!'

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 1 - The Stop Sign
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: J introduces herself and walks us through the awkwardness of the stop-sign.

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 2 - The Job
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: J confronts her issue with passive aggressiveness at the workplace.

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 3 - The Hallway
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: J attempts to pursue her office crush and navigates the awkwardness of the hallway.

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 4 - The Icebreaker
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: J and Cece's friendship develops, while NIna finds her own ally in the office.

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 5 - The Dance
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: J awkwardly struggles through her work crush's birthday party.

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 6 - The Stapler
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: Unable to properly deal with her personal frustration in the workplace, J is sent to anger management.

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 7 - The Date
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: J embarks on her first White Date' with Jay.

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 8 - The Project
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: As J deals with the awkwardness of talking to Fred, CeCe is faced with an overly religious co-worker.

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 9 - Happy Hour
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: J has to deal with the awkwardness of group dinners when Boss Lady rewards her Gutbuster employees by taking them out to dinner.

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 10 - The Unexpected, Pt. 1
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: When Nina takes over the office, J and the Gutbuster employees are subject to her wrath. A special Halloween episode!

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 11 - The Unexpected, Pt. 2
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: When Nina takes over the office, J and the Gutbuster employees are subject to her wrath. A special Halloween episode!

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 12 - The Exes
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: After being dissed by White Jay, CeCe causes J to reflect on her dating history.

Awkward Black Girl.Name: Awkward Black Girl - Episode 13 - The Decision
Awkward Black Girl.Plot: In the season finale of Awkward Black Girl, when Fred and White Jay make an unexpected visit to J's place, she is forced to make a decision.

Journey Quest.Name: Journey Quest - Episode 1 - Onward
Journey Quest.Plot: Perf attempts to leave the quest, with bloody results...

Journey Quest.Name: Journey Quest - Episode 2 - Sod the Quest
Journey Quest.Plot: A devious riddle divides the party...

Journey Quest.Name: Journey Quest - Episode 3 - A Rather Unfortunate Turn of Events
Journey Quest.ShortName: A Rather Unfortunate Turn of Events
Journey Quest.Plot: Perf gives an orcish grammar lesson. Meanwhile, Glorion battles the river...

Journey Quest.Name: Journey Quest - Episode 4 - Deadly, Ancient Magicks
Journey Quest.Plot: Perf goes on the run... with Nara's destiny.

Journey Quest.Name: Journey Quest - Episode 5 - Not a Zombie
Journey Quest.Plot: Perf blows another spell, Glorion encounters a gargoyle, and the orcs have a very bad day.

Journey Quest.Name: Journey Quest - Episode 6 - Bardic Immunity
Journey Quest.Plot: In which we learn who Wren is and why she is following the party.

Journey Quest.Name: Journey Quest - Episode 7 - Duplicitous Bastards
Journey Quest.Plot: In which a betrayal is revealed. (SEASON FINALE)

Out With Dad.Name: Out With Dad - Episode 1 - Rose with Vanessa
Out With Dad.Plot: The premiere episode of Out With Dad. 15 year old Rose (Kate Conway) and her best friend Vanessa (Lindsey Middleton), find out that sometimes first kisses don't turn out exactly how we expect.

Out With Dad.Name: Out With Dad - Episode 2 - Out To Lunch
Out With Dad.Plot: Nathan (Will Conlon) wants to learn how to help Rose. First thing he learns is that friends are more reliable than the Internet. Meanwhile, Kenny (Corey Lof) encorages Rose (Kate Conway) to make amends with Vanessa (Lindsey Middleton).

Out With Dad.Name: Out With Dad - Episode 3 - Movie Night with Dad
Out With Dad.Plot: Vanessa (Lindsey Middleton) tries to force Rose (Kate Conway) into explaining herself, but an encounter on the subway is more clarifying. Nathan (Will Conlon) continues to try to reach out to Rose in ways even his subconscious finds embarrassing.

Out With Dad.Name: Out With Dad - Episode 4 - Party Out
Out With Dad.Plot: Ingredients for a high school party: a parentless basement, mood lighting, a dancing fool and someone crying in the bathroom.

Out With Dad.Name: Out With Dad - Episode 5 - Blind Date with Nathan
Out With Dad.Plot: Nathan (Will Conlon) is out on a blind date with Angela (Kelly Marie-Murtha).

Out With Dad.Name: Out With Dad - Episode 6 - Tea with Dad
Out With Dad.Plot: A bonus minisode. Nothing like a spot of tea to make everything better. The conclusion of Rose & Nathan's nights out.

Out With Dad.Name: Out With Dad - Episode 7 - Chemistry with Vanessa
Out With Dad.Plot: In this penultimate episode of season one, things are shaping up for Rose.

Out With Dad.Name: Out With Dad - Episode 8 - Out With Kenny
Out With Dad.Plot: In this finale episode of our first season, Rose finds coming out isn't easy... even when you practice.

H+.Name: H+ - Episode 1 - Driving Under
H+.Plot: Fragments of news reports show a future world as it adopts H+: a radical new way to be connected to information and each other through only your thoughts, via a high-tech implant. While the breakthrough is hotly anticipated by the masses, it is a change not easily adopted by its discontents. We segue to a couple parking their car in an underground airport garage. The husband, Lee, surreptitiously watches a football game on his H+, upsetting his wife Julie who wants him to drive safely. Their domestic squabble is interrupted by a bizarre spectacle throwing their world into chaos.

H+.Name: H+ - Episode 2 - On Their Level
H+.Plot: Julie and Lee stand shocked at the sudden chaos surrounding them in the lot and then risk a similar fate as Lee goes to aid the fallen people. A mysterious bearded man in glasses, Kenneth, appears and leads a small group down to Level 6, where he insists they're safe. But some in the group are skeptical of their hero and his theory for what has just happened.

H+.Name: H+ - Episode 3 - Prophetess
H+.Plot: A young man, Topi, enters a bar to meet a woman named Manta, who he has chatted with online. Manta plays mysterious, giving Topi a hard time, but Topi may have secrets of his own.

H+.Name: H+ - Episode 4 - Airport Security
H+.Plot: With a small group from Level 6 of the parking structure, Kenneth takes Lee's body to a van to get out of the water from the sprinkler system with the hope he may be able to save him.

H+.Name: H+ - Episode 5 - A Large Family
H+.Plot: Breanna, a hard-charging technology executive, and her husband Connal (both Irish) meet with a doctor, Gurveer, and a young woman, Leena (both Indian), to arrange a surrogate pregnancy. When the introductory meeting turns into something more like an interrogation and Breanna leaves to continue a work call on her H+, Connall tries to make a more human connection.

H+.Name: H+ - Episode 6 - Voci Dal Sud
H+.Plot: In a desolate village, Matteo tries to help a man injured in an accident, but realizes getting the medicine he needs will not be easy.

H+.Name: H+ - Episode 7 - Implanted
H+.Plot: Gurveer prepares to implant H+ in Leena so the Sheehans can track her pregnancy from abroad; she's anxious and asks many questions about the process. Gurveer, who tells her his own body is not compatible with H+, tells her she is lucky...though something else is commanding his attention.

H+.Name: H+ - Episode 8 - Makeshift Engineering
H+.Plot: Kenneth races to save Lee's life with spare wiring and circuit boards. Francesca, a soon to be a board-certified neurologist, objects to Kenneth's methods and can't believe what she's seeing.

I Hate Being Single.Name: I Hate Being Single - Episode 1 - That's Love
I Hate Being Single.Plot: Rob is forced to start living as a single in Brooklyn and looks to Dom and Shannon for support.

I Hate Being Single.Name: I Hate Being Single - Episode 2 - I'm a Mature
I Hate Being Single.Plot: Rob goes out to brunch with Shannon and her pals. He goes out on a date with a college crush and get's too comfortable with his new 'snuggie'.

I Hate Being Single.Name: I Hate Being Single - Episode 3 - The Banker
I Hate Being Single.Plot: Rob becomes friends with his banker, gains a lot of credit cards, and has an unfortunate encounter with a volunteer organization worker.

I Hate Being Single.Name: I Hate Being Single - Episode 4 - Wouldn't Wanna Be Ya
I Hate Being Single.Plot: Rob is pressured into attending a 'get together' with Dom and his friend from work. When Dom leaves early, Rob is forced to play Jenga with a crowd of strangers.

I Hate Being Single.Name: I Hate Being Single - Episode 5 - Do You Like Me?
I Hate Being Single.Plot: Rob goes out on a date with an old elementary school crush. He is disappointed to find that she doesn't remember him as much as he expected.

I Hate Being Single.Name: I Hate Being Single - Episode 6 - Season Finale Part 1
I Hate Being Single.Plot: Rob is temped to contact his ex but falls in to a secret group of boat dwelling bachelors to learn how to embrace the Brooklyn single life. His skills are put to the test at a boat party where an unfortunate visitor arrives.

I Hate Being Single.Name: I Hate Being Single - Episode 7 - Season Finale Part 2
I Hate Being Single.Plot: Rob goes out on a catch up date with his ex. The results of the date leave him with a new appetite for life.

Kicking Dan Out.Name: Kicking Dan Out - Episode 1 - KICKING DAN OUT
Kicking Dan Out.Plot: What do you do with an unwanted roommate? You kick them out.

Kicking Dan Out.Name: Kicking Dan Out - Episode 2 - ONE NIGHT STAND
Kicking Dan Out.Plot: Dan has a one night stand...and then doesn't leave her house.

Kicking Dan Out.Name: Kicking Dan Out - Episode 3 - INSANE CLOWN PARTY FOUL
Kicking Dan Out.Plot: Dan wants to be a juggalo.

Kicking Dan Out.Name: Kicking Dan Out - Episode 4 - OCCUPY WALL STREET
Kicking Dan Out.Plot: Dan gets his protest on at Occupy Wall Street.

Kicking Dan Out.Name: Kicking Dan Out - Episode 5 - SHELL OF A MOR-MAN
Kicking Dan Out.Plot: Dan gives Mormonism his best shot.

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Name: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries - Episode 1 - My Name is Lizzie Bennet
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Plot: The video diary I started as part of a class project with my best friend Charlotte.

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Name: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries - Episode 2 - My Sisters: Problematic to Practically Perfect
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.ShortName: My Sisters: Problematic to Practically Perfect
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Plot: Introducing my sisters...I have two. Lydia, who...is Lydia. And Jane, who works her butt off for her family and never thinks of herself. Also, you may have noticed she's gorgeous.

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Name: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries - Episode 3 - My Parents: Opposingly Supportive
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Plot: Inspired by Reggie on Facebook, I made this video about my parents so you can get to know them a little more. - But actually showing them? Well that would require me telling them that I'm doing this... so that's going to be a 'no'. Or at least a 'not yet'.

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Name: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries - Episode 4 - Bing Lee and His 500 Teenage Prostitutes
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.ShortName: Bing Lee and His 500 Teenage Prostitutes
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Plot: The thought of Bing Lee dominates my mother's life. It's all she talks about. So through everything my crazily lovable mother, the 2.5 WPF club, and my out of control baby sister, you lovely people get to learn all about Bing Lee.

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Name: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries - Episode 5 - After the Wedding: The Real Bing Lee
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.ShortName: After the Wedding: The Real Bing Lee
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Plot: So...this weekend was interesting. The wedding was lovely, barring some extremely unfortunate events that I will not get into right now. But Bing and Jane did, like, I mean, really hit it off, so Mom is unsurprisingly a 50 gallon barrel of pleased. Today though, I just wanted to grill Jane on the evening's events.

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Name: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries - Episode 6 - Snobby Mr. Douchey
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Plot: You were all quite specific that you wanted me to talk more about meeting Mr. Darcy, so today, I give you half the story. Boring, stuffy, and rude, I really don't get how Bing and him are friends. Regardless, watch Lydia and I reenact the events of the Gibson wedding for you.

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Name: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries - Episode 7 - The Most Awkward Dance Ever
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Plot: After this I'm done talking about the Gibson Wedding. I really didn't want to talk about this, but it's been bugging me. Like really bugging me. Like can't study and all my projects suck bugging me. So here it is, the Most awkward dance ever with Darcy. - oh and I miss Charlotte, she should be back this week.

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Name: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries - Episode 8 - Charlotte's Back!
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Plot: Yay Charlotte is back. I hope she never leaves again. Watch as she and I catch up. Also she apparently told something to my mother that didn't exactly thrill me, but hey it's Charlotte and I love her.

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Name: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries - Episode 9 - Single and Happyish
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Plot: As my mother has been pushing for the day that her three single daughters are 'properly' wed, I'd like to point out in this video that it's perfectly okay (and usually better) that you wait and find the right person.

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Name: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries - Episode 10 - Cats and Chinchillas
The Lizzie Bennet Diaries.Plot: So I got some pictures of some cats playing with Chinchillas. I was going to spend today talking about adorableness and not Bing, but then Jane showed up and, well...

Red Vs. Blue.Name: Red Vs Blue - Episode 1 - Why Are We Here?
Red Vs. Blue.Plot: The first episode of Red vs. Blue introduces the main characters, and poses the all-important question, why are we here?

Red Vs. Blue.Name: Red Vs Blue - Episode 2 - Red Gets a Delivery
Red Vs. Blue.Plot: The Reds get a new piece of equipment, and Grif has a problem with its name.

Red Vs. Blue.Name: Red Vs Blue - Episode 3 - The Rookies
Red Vs. Blue.Plot: The Red and Blue armies get new recruits.

Red Vs. Blue.Name: Red Vs Blue - Episode 4 - Head Noob in Charge
Red Vs. Blue.Plot: Caboose is given the job of 'guarding the flag.' Donut goes to the store.

Red Vs. Blue.Name: Red Vs Blue - Episode 5 - The Package Is in the Open
Red Vs. Blue.ShortName: The Package Is in the Open
Red Vs. Blue.Plot: Donut returns from the store with a surprise.

Red Vs. Blue.Name: Red Vs Blue - Episode 6 - 1.21 Giga-Whats??
Red Vs. Blue.Plot: The Blues go through the teleporter. The Reds get the upper hand.

Red Vs. Blue.Name: Red Vs Blue - Episode 7 - Check out the Treads on That Tank
Red Vs. Blue.ShortName: Check out the Treads on That Tank
Red Vs. Blue.Plot: While Church and Tucker lament their current situation, Caboose hops into the tank.

Red Vs. Blue.Name: Red Vs Blue - Episode 8 - Don‚Äôt Ph34r the Reaper
Red Vs. Blue.Plot: Grif and Simmons flee as Caboose‚Äôs trigger happy firing has dire consequences.

Red Vs. Blue.Name: Red Vs Blue - Episode 9 - After Church
Red Vs. Blue.Plot: The cavalry arrives, and Caboose gets stuck.

Red Vs. Blue.Name: Red Vs Blue - Episode 10 - A Shadow of His Former Self
Red Vs. Blue.ShortName: A Shadow of His Former Self
Red Vs. Blue.Plot: Tucker requests reinforcements, and gets more than he bargained for.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Pilot
The Vault.Plot: An introduction to 'The Vault,' an original web series.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 2
The Vault.Plot: Henry must contend with a game much larger than he anticipated.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 3
The Vault.Plot: Armed with a new strategy and new allies, Henry renews his focus.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 4
The Vault.Plot: As day 2 begins, Henry struggles to make progress.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 5
The Vault.Plot: The discovery of a key player may be the break the others have been waiting for.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 6
The Vault.Plot: Unforeseen complications threaten the entire game.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 7
The Vault.Plot: In the aftermath of the game's latest twist, Henry weighs his options.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 8
The Vault.Plot: As a new deadline looms, the players race to unlock the Vault.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 9
The Vault.Plot: Games within the game slow the players' momentum.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 10
The Vault.Plot: The players' knowledge of each other is tested.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 11
The Vault.Plot: As time runs low, what's locked inside one of the rooms may be the key to advancing.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 14
The Vault.Plot: As The Vault comes ever closer to shutting down, Henry comes face-to-face with his final challenge...among other things.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 15
The Vault.Plot: After days of surprises and setbacks, it's all coming to an end...whether they're ready for it or not.

The Vault.Name: The Vault - Episode 16
The Vault.Plot: One way or another, the game ends here. The series finale of 'The Vault.'

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 1 - Episode 1 - Duane
Downsized.Plot: Debt, credit default, bankruptcy, and unemployment-- average Americans are the subjects of the hit dramedy Downsized, recently named 'the best of the straight dramas (on the web)' by the Los Angeles Times.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 1 - Episode 2 - Broken English
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 2, overworked attorney Connor has difficulty understanding his Turkish cleaning lady, Leyla.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 1 - Episode 3 - Pageantry
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 3, after finding out she can't make her credit card payments, resourceful beauty queen Astrid tries sweet-talking pageant dad Nate into additional coaching services for his daughter, six year old beauty princess Poppy.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 1 - Episode 4 - Self-Help
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 4, Andy discovers that his half-brother Lowell has stolen the tenets of Andy's self-help process The E-Trinity, and plans to present it as his corporate restructuring program, the E Quad.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 1 - Episode 5 - Linguistics
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 5, a more composed Leyla explains herself to Connor, with the help of Learn to Speak English dvds.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 1 - Episode 6 - Unemployment Blues
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 6, Beth tries to figure out how to adjust to life expectations in a financial crisis, while her fiance heads off to work as a nighttime security guard.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 1 - Episode 7 - Grand Supreme
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 7, in an effort to bring in more cash to get her out of debt, Astrid double-books herself at a children's beauty pageant, and is overwhelmed when pageant princess Poppy locks herself in the ladies room and refuses to come out, and a pesky pageant mom has a mouthful of thoughts on the subject.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 1 - Episode 8 - Split Assets
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 8, despite an acrimonious relationship, Andy attempts to coerce his ex Priscilla to lend him some money.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 1 - Episode 9 - Valentine's Day
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 9, Connor is summoned to help his drunk and frisky soon-to-be-ex-wife Maura get home. Hank finds a creative way to romance Beth.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 1 - Episode 10 - Creative Real Estate
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 10, Priscilla and Justin attempt to woo back their evicted tenants, Hank and Beth, in order to stop their foreclosure.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 2 - Epsiode 1 - Employment
Downsized.Plot: In the Season 2 Opener 'Employment', Hank (Gerard Urciuoli) tries to shake Beth (Daryn Strauss, Digital Chick TV) out of her unemployment depression while she searches for a job, while Connor (Chris Henry Coffey, Trust with Clive Owen) is caught between the sheets with his estranged wife (Michele Mavissakalian).

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 2 - Epsiode 2 - Clientele
Downsized.Plot: In episode 2 'Clientele' of Downsized Season 2, Astrid (Shannon Conley, Lez Zeppelin) manages to squeeze a few extra bucks out of Nate (Kaipo Schwab) by convincing him to compete in a Daddy and Me competition with Poppy, but finds his wife Brenda (Anna Stone, Boardwalk Empire) isn't so easy to swindle.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 2 - Epsiode 3 - Personal Property
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 3 'Personal Property' of Downsized Season 2, Andy (Conan McCarty, The Closer) goes door-to-door with his self-help program for surviving the economic crisis, The E Trinity, and discovers his ex-wife Priscilla (Meredith Zinner, Erin Brockovich) is selling off their property in a House Sale.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 2 - Epsiode 4 - The American Dream
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 4 'The American Dream' of Downsized Season 2, a conflicted Connor (Chris Henry Coffey, Trust with Clive Owen) surprises new mother Leyla (Esra Gaffin) with a visit in her 'hood, much to the chagrin of her disapproving sister Dunya (Aysan Celik), while Beth (Daryn Strauss, DigitalChickTV) tries to mooch off her friend Bonnie's connections (Maitely Weismann, Mother Eve's Secret Garden of Sensual Sisterhood).... as in wifi connections.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 2 - Epsiode 5 - Debt Ceiling
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 5 'Debt Ceiling' of Downsized Season 2, Connor (Chris Henry Coffey, TRUST) and Justin (Brian Keane, BEARCITY) meet for some gym time and debt remediation talk, but Justin can't keep up.

Downsized.Name: Downsized - Season 2 - Epsiode 6 - Dad Headache
Downsized.Plot: In Episode 6 of the Writers Guild Award nominated dramedy Downsized, Astrid's headache is the least of her problems when Nate has some news about Poppy's pageanting.

Long Story Short.Name: Long Story Short - Episode 1 - I Had to Write an Essay
Long Story Short.ShortName: I Had to Write an Essay
Long Story Short.Plot: Tommy has to write an essay.

Long Story Short.Name: Long Story Short - Episode 2 - I Had a Movie Date
Long Story Short - Episode 3 - I Went to the Beach
Long Story Short - Episode 4 - I Went to a Boxing Class
Long Story Short.ShortName: I Went to a Boxing Class
Long Story Short.Plot: Tommy goes to a boxing class.

Long Story Short.Name: Long Story Short - Episode 5 - I Couldn't Fall Asleep
Long Story Short - Episode 6 - We Made a Web Series
Long Story Short.Plot: Almog and Tom make a web series.

Long Story Short.Name: Long Story Short - Episode 7 - I Went to the Bathroom
Long Story Short.Plot: Tommy has to go to the bathroom.

Long Story Short.Name: Long Story Short - Episode 8 - I Went For a Run
Long Story Short - Episode 9 - I Went Home for the Holidays
Long Story Short.ShortName: I Went Home for the Holidays
Long Story Short.Plot: Tommy goes home for the holidays.

Long Story Short.Name: Long Story Short - Episode 10 - I Heard Voices
Long Story Short - Episode 11 - I Got Sick
Long Story Short - Episode 12 - I Moved
